meanings.definition: A stand with three legs, used to hold hot dishes.
meanings.sent1: The trivet kept the hot pot safely above the table.
meanings.sent2: She placed the trivet under the casserole to prevent the table from getting damaged.
meanings.sent3: The trivet danced around the kitchen, trying to find its place next to the stove.
meanings.sent4: The trivet stood like a loyal guard, supporting the sizzling pan.
meanings.sent5: The shiny trivet gleamed under the weight of the steaming dish.

meanings.definition: To place a trivet under a hot dish to protect the table.
meanings.sent1: Mom will trivet the roast before serving it on the dining table.
meanings.sent2: Remember to trivet the teapot to avoid any marks on the wooden surface.
meanings.sent3: He triveted the frying pan playfully, pretending it was a magic trick.
meanings.sent4: She triveted the tray with care, like shielding a precious treasure.
meanings.sent5: Triveting the pot with the colorful trivet made the whole scene look cozy.
